text:

trans:
Interior: Carbon dashboard trim,
Center console, carbon front panel
Isofix child seat mountings on front passenger seat
Body: 2-door
Ceramic braking system (Porsche Ceramic Composite
Brake, PCCB)
Yellow-painted brake calipers
Keyless access control
Clothes hook Leather seat back
2-zone automatic climate control
Porsche Side Impact Protection curtain airbag system
System (POSIP)
Front head-shoulder airbag (thorax airbag)
Android Auto online mobile services
3.8 liter. engine - 478 kW Turbo KAT
Otto particulate filter (OPF)
Electric parking brake
Porsche Active Suspension Management (PASM)
Porsche Communications Management (PCM) including online navigation module
Porsche Stability Management (PSM)
Porsche Torque Vectoring Plus (PTV Plus)
Electronically controlled transverse rear axle lock
Porsche Traction Management (PTM)
Digital radio reception (DAB+)
Wheel hub caps - Full-colour Porsche crest
Tire pressure monitoring system
Low-emission according to Euro 6d emissions standard
Model series entry
Painted rocker panel cover
Electromechanical power steering
Heated front seats
Sport button
Sport-Chrono Pack
Start/Stop system
Turbo
Plain paint
Vehicle tracking system (PVTS)
Electric soft-top control
Tinted glass
Four-wheel steering
Immobilizer system
Electric windscreen
Central locking with radio remote control
Special equipment
Storage pack
Exterior rearview mirror Carbon top shell
Illuminated carbon sill panels
Access lighting with LED spotlight Inscription Porsche
Driver assistance system: Porsche InnoDrive incl.
Speed and distance control
Cruise control (Tempomat) with
Distance control
Driver assistance system: Lane change assistant
Front window with band filter at top
Vehicle without model designation
Exclusiv Design tail lights
Interior lighting package / Lighting design package
Overhead ambient lighting
Interior Pack Decorative stitching in different colors
Comfort access (keyless door unlocking)
Front headrest with Porsche badge
